mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge(chname, chdesc, chimg, chsuccess, chdonate, chexp, chmaxp, chsdate, chedate, donatepay, donateco) VALUES(#{chname}, #{chdesc}, #{chimgname}, #{chsuccess}, #{chdonate}, #{chexp}, #{chmaxp}, #{chsdate}, #{chedate}, #{donatepay}, #{donateco})
mapper.select: SELECT chnum, chname, chdesc, chimg as chimgname, chsuccess, chdonate, chexp, chmaxp, chsdate, chedate, donatepay, donateco FROM challenge limit #{index}, #{count}
SELECT count(*) FROM challenging WHERE personalpf = 0 AND nickname LIKE #{nickname};
SELECT count(*) FROM challenging WHERE personalpf = 1 AND nickname LIKE #{nickname};
SELECT chname FROM challenge WHERE chnum = #{chnum}
SELECT count(*) FROM challenging WHERE chnum = #{chnum}
SELECT count(*) FROM challenging WHERE personalpf = 1 AND chnum = #{chnum}
SELECT count(*) FROM checks WHERE chnum = #{chnum}
SELECT count(*) FROM checks WHERE nickname LIKE #{nickname}
SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY auth
SELECT count(toggle.report) FROM checks LEFT JOIN toggle ON checks.checkid = toggle.checkid WHERE nickname LIKE #{nickname}
SELECT member.nickname AS nickname, email, level, challenging.personalpf AS personalpf FROM member LEFT JOIN challenging ON member.nickname = challenging.nickname WHERE chnum = #{chnum}
